events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter specialized in software development roles has been assigned to handle your application.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, and we are impressed with your background.
Thank you for your prompt response to the screening interview questions; your enthusiasm is appreciated.
Your technical interview has been successfully scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM via video call.
The technical interview was completed, and the feedback from the engineering panel was very positive.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 11 AM to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview went well, and they appreciated your communication skills and alignment with our values.
We are pleased to propose you an official offer for the Software Engineer position, including salary and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer, expressing excitement to join the engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer, and we look forward to welcoming you on board as an Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to all engineering systems and necessary equipment.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with your official start as a Software Engineer completed.
